auto_merge.commit_message:
Uses Python generator functions to extract common functionality from the different export/import code generation methods.
Removes some slight differences that crawled up between them over time.

Follow-up to https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/7034 since there was a lot more to clean up.
auto_merge.commit_title: Refactor code generation for import/export code of api functions and pointers to reduce redundancy (GH-7039)

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
Uses Python generator functions to extract common functionality from the different export/import code generation methods.
Removes some slight differences that crawled up between them over time.

Follow-up to https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/7034 since there was a lot more to clean up.

comment_data.body: Is this a requirement? - it's passed the api dict as an argument
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -711,38 +720,26 @@ static int __Pyx_ImportVoidPtr_$cyversion(PyObject *module, const char *name, vo
 }
 #endif
 
+
 /////////////// VoidPtrExport.proto ///////////////
 
-static int __Pyx_ExportVoidPtr(PyObject *name, void *p, const char *sig); /*proto*/
+static int __Pyx_ExportVoidPtr(PyObject *api_dict, PyObject *name, void *p, const char *sig); /*proto*/
 
 /////////////// VoidPtrExport ///////////////
-//@substitute: naming
-//@requires: ObjectHandling.c::PyObjectSetAttrStr
+//@requires: GetApiDict

comment_data.body: Hmm. I was thinking of a common function that both export types use, thus the dependency from both. But you're right, it would be cleaner to move the dependency where it actually occurs, in the generation code. Will do that.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -711,38 +720,26 @@ static int __Pyx_ImportVoidPtr_$cyversion(PyObject *module, const char *name, vo
 }
 #endif
 
+
 /////////////// VoidPtrExport.proto ///////////////
 
-static int __Pyx_ExportVoidPtr(PyObject *name, void *p, const char *sig); /*proto*/
+static int __Pyx_ExportVoidPtr(PyObject *api_dict, PyObject *name, void *p, const char *sig); /*proto*/
 
 /////////////// VoidPtrExport ///////////////
-//@substitute: naming
-//@requires: ObjectHandling.c::PyObjectSetAttrStr
+//@requires: GetApiDict

commit.message: Refactor code generation for import/export code of api functions and pointers to reduce redundancy.

commit.message:
Build: Avoid SSSE3 CPU instructions in binary Linux wheels that some AMD CPUs do not support.

Closes https://github.com/cython/cython/issues/7038
Make utility code dependency explicit where it is used.

milestone.description: First feature release after the cleanup releases 3.0 and 3.1.

title: Refactor code generation for import/export code of api functions and pointers to reduce redundancy
